results.adx_keywords: Brzezinski, Mika;Scarborough, Joe;Trump, Donald J;News and News Media
results.byline: By GLENN THRUSH and MAGGIE HABERMAN
results.title: Trump Mocks Mika Brzezinski; Says She Was ‘Bleeding Badly From a Face-Lift’
results.abstract: The president used Twitter to taunt Ms. Brzezinski and her MSNBC co-host, Joe Scarborough, referring to them as “low I.Q. Crazy Mika, along with Psycho Joe.”

media.caption: Mika Brzezinski in Trump Tower in November.

results.adx_keywords: Trump, Donald J;United States Politics and Government;Democratic Party
results.title: Donald Skunks the Democrats
results.abstract: Four participation trophies later, the Democrats finally take a look in the mirror. Even they aren’t sure who’s staring back.

media.caption: Supporters of the Democratic candidate Jon Ossoff after his loss in Georgia on Tuesday night.

results.title: Cyberattack Hits Ukraine Then Spreads Internationally
results.abstract: This ransomware attack, a more sophisticated assault based on a vulnerability exploited in May, hit companies across the globe.

results.title: Subway Derailment in Manhattan Injures Dozens

results.abstract: Experts recommend a multifaceted approach: Don’t answer unknown numbers, use call-blocking apps and report unwanted calls to the government.

media.caption: The Federal Communications Commission said consumers received an estimated 2.4 billion robocalls per month last year.

results.title: Supreme Court Takes Up Travel Ban Case, and Allows Parts to Go Ahead
